creditline: Gift of Raymond A. and Ruth A. Reister
text: The Bwami society is responsible for the social, religious and political organization of traditional Lega communities.  Bwami membership is open to both men and women and individuals advance through many grades with growing experience and knowledge.  Ivory maskettes and other symbolic objects are reserved for the highest ranks of Bwami.  The second set of eyes refers to extended vision and wisdom.
title: Mask
